column1: Uchi////The one real knock I have on Uchi is the "complimentary valet". I found the whole operation to be shady
column2: seemingly run by guys who just needed a job and are pretending to be fancy
column3: and who have no real respect for patrons. I found an animal cracker on my seat when my car was brought back to me. No wrapper
column4: just a cookie. When I asked the valet for change to break my 20
column6: and asked me if that was okay. It was an awkward moment
column7: because I could feel it was scripted
column9: and I honestly wanted to say no. This experience had me leave with a bitter taste in my mouth. The valet experience needs to be cleaned up
